about.description: With over 8 years of experience in business analysis and product management, I specialize in bridging the gap between business needs and technical solutions. My approach combines analytical thinking with strategic vision to deliver impactful results.
about.extended_description: As a Product Owner I am pleased to know my decisions improve other's lives. With my data centric perspective, I enjoy discussing about product definitions and user experience. I love technology and I'm proud it is part of my profession. I am empathic, responsible, I learn fast and I'm looking for challenges with great impact that allow me as well to maintain a continuous discovery, giving me the chance to stand out and be recognized
